title: Lagg issue
body:
Hello everyone!

So for the last 2-3 days ive been in contact with unsual bug/lagg. Few times per game my champion just freeze in place but my ms/ping is normal (around 30) and my FPS is locked to 60, i cant move but i cant write in chat and see what is going on around the map. 

Please if you have any advice help me.

GZA

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having some network problems packet loss, which can result in delays communicating to our game server despite having an okay ping.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to be sure.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot your network, then test it in a custom game.  Let me know how that works out!
Thank you for reply, i found thread with similar problem and downloaded Hextech tool, hope it works
Cool!  Keep in mind that the HRT is a supplement to help with some steps, and not a fix all.  You'll still want to go through the connection guide.  Good luck!
